title: Senior Backend Engineer
description:
At SolarWinds, we’re a people\\-first company. Our purpose is to enrich the lives of the people we serve—including our employees, customers, shareholders, partners, and communities. Join us in our mission to help customers accelerate business transformation with simple, powerful, and secure solutions.
 



 The ideal candidate thrives in an innovative, fast\\-paced environment and is collaborative, accountable, ready, and empathetic. We’re looking for individuals who believe they can accomplish more as a team and create lasting growth for themselves and others. We hire based on attitude, competency, and commitment. Solarians are ready to advance our world\\-class solutions in a fast\\-paced environment and accept the challenge to lead with purpose. If you’re looking to build your career with an exceptional team, you’ve come to the right place. Join SolarWinds and grow with us!
 















**Overview:** 




 We are seeking a Senior backend Software Engineer to join our world\\-class Database Engineering organization. This team is responsible for the development and maintenance of a suite of industry\\-leading database performance monitoring and related applications. These products improve the quality of life for database professionals by providing best\\-in\\-class performance monitoring and productivity solutions across multiple database platforms, whether in the cloud or on\\-prem.
 



 This position will be ideal for you if you enjoy building enterprise solutions that are architected for high scale, reliability, security, and performance, are adept at developing upon requirements through delivery to impact customers on a global scale, and are also able to upskill the engineering organization by example. You should be excited to work with multiple tech stacks, solving complicated problems on multiple products and platforms.
 



 In this role, you will technically lead the development of our existing industry\\-leading solutions and help define the future of our database capabilities on our new Full Stack Observability SaaS platform.
 



**Responsibilities:** 



* Design and implementation of proof of concepts and productized features that leverage new database capabilities
* Embrace engineering practices through a broad approach to engineering quality (consistent and thoughtful patterns, improved observability, unit and integration testing, etc.).
* Think outside of the current technology/stack limitations to push the boundaries of what is possible and deliver feasible solutions collaboratively.
* Promote a culture of engineering excellence and strengthen the database technical expertise of our engineering and product teams.
* Partner with product leaders to understand customer pain points and market opportunities and translate them into clear and robust engineering solutions.



**Qualifications:** 



* Bachelor’s degree with 5\\+ years of industry experience, or Master’s degree with 3\\+ years of industry experience.
* Production experience with independent development in
* Go APIs,
* business logic,
* Go Agents,
* Kafka,
* MySQL storage,
* Distributed design and
* Microservices
* Independently develops complex features through multiple layers (frontend, backend)
* Drives the problem from its definition till successful completion on her own
* Experience with DevOps principles a plus











 SolarWinds is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. SolarWinds will consider all qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, disability, veteran status or any other characteristic protected by law.
 



 All applications are treated in accordance with the SolarWinds Privacy Notice: https://www.solarwinds.com/applicant\\-privacy\\-notice

title: Software Engineer (Cache Developer)
description:
To design, develop, and maintain efficient applications using the InterSystems Cache database, ensuring optimal performance, seamless data management, and integration, while continuously optimizing queries, ensuring data consistency, and supporting the system’s scalability and reliability.
   

  

**Duties \\& Responsibilities**
* Application Development \\& Maintenance:


 Develop, implement, and maintain applications using InterSystems Cache, focusing on writing efficient ObjectScript code and integrating with existing systems.
   

  

* Performance Tuning \\& Query Optimization: Optimize SQL queries and ObjectScript code to improve database performance, reduce latency, and ensure efficient data retrieval.
* Troubleshooting \\& Issue Resolution: Identify and resolve issues in production environments, including database performance, application bugs, and data inconsistencies.
* Data Consistency \\& Cache Management: Ensure data consistency across the Cache database and external systems by implementing caching strategies, handling cache invalidation, and ensuring synchronization.
* Collaboration \\& Support: Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams (developers, testers, system administrators) to implement and support solutions, while assisting junior developers with technical challenges.


**Skills Required**
* InterSystems Cache Object Script/Cache Objects.
* Experience in Cache SQL
* Prior experience developing software for the regulatory environment in healthcare is strongly desired


**Qualifications Required**
* Bachelor’s degree (B.A.) from four\\-year college or university, or equivalent combination of education and experience.
* 6\\+ years of experience in Intersystem’s Cache Development using ObjectScript / Cache Objects

title: Software Development Engineer in Test
description:
**About Eightfold**
 Eightfold is a global leader in AI\\-native enterprise talent platform, trusted by the world’s largest \\& most respected fortune 500 organizations. Our platform is built from the ground up operating at scale across Azure and AWS, deployed in multiple regions globally, including IL4\\-compliant environments for US Government, supporting users in 100\\+ countries and 30\\+ languages. Today, Eightfold is at the forefront of agentic AI, delivering intelligent agents that actively drive outcomes across hiring and talent workflows, while much of the industry is still experimenting with prototypes. Backed by over $410M in funding and valued at $2B\\+, we are defining the next era of agentic talent systems.
   

  

 What sets Eightfold apart is not just the technology \\& our mission, but the team behind it. We are a deeply technical, execution\\-driven organization that values ownership, collaboration, and high standards. Our engineers, product leaders, and go\\-to\\-market teams work closely together — in person and across functions — to build systems that scale in the real world. If you’re excited to work on hard problems, move with urgency, raise the bar every day, and help build agentic systems that transform how the world works, Eightfold is the place to do it.
   

  

 You may want to refer to the media coverage on TechCrunch and Reuters.
   

  

**Eightfold.ai** 
 is led by Ashutosh Garg, a PhD in Machine Learning/IIT Delhi alumni who managed Search and Personalization at Google, and Varun Kacholia
 **\\-** 
 IIT Bombay alumni, who led the News Feed Ranking team at Facebook and developed YouTube Search at Google.
   

  

**Our customers**
**Press**
**Role Overview**
 We are looking for passionate and skilled SDETs to join our Quality Engineering team. As an SDET, you will work closely with our development teams to design, develop, and maintain automated test frameworks and ensure the delivery of high\\-quality software products.
   

  

**What You Will Learn To Do**
* Design, develop, and execute automated test scripts for web, mobile, and API applications.
* Collaborate with developers and product teams to understand requirements and define test strategies.
* Identify, document, and track defects using standard defect tracking tools.
* Participate in code reviews and provide feedback on testability and quality aspects.
* Develop and maintain test frameworks, tools, and continuous integration pipelines.
* Ensure high\\-quality software delivery by applying best practices in testing and automation.


**What We Look For**
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
* Strong expertise in test automation frameworks (Selenium, Playwright, Cypress, Appium, JUnit, TestNG, PyTest, etc.).
* Hands\\-on experience in programming/scripting using Python
* Proven track record in testing SaaS\\-based enterprise products (preferably in large\\-scale, data\\-intensive domains).
* Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure) and CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, CircleCI, etc.).
* Familiarity with modern AI\\-assisted development tools, such as Cursor or similar, to accelerate automation/coding workflows.
* Exposure to performance testing, security testing, and test data management.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail.


**What We Offer**
* Opportunity to work in a fast\\-paced, innovative environment.
* Exposure to cutting\\-edge technologies and tools.
* Collaborative culture with learning and growth opportunities.


**Eightfold Engineering Values**
 We are a team of self\\-starters who excel in their fields. We believe in giving you responsibility, not a task. We want you to have ownership and pride in the work you are doing, and see the positive impact of your work on your colleagues, our customers, and people around the world. We have a mindset of continuously improving. There is no detail that is beneath us, and we can dive into anything needed. We focus on executing fast and delivering value to our customers every single day. We believe in providing transparency and support, so you can do the best work of your career.
   

  

**﻿Hybrid Work**
 At Eightfold, we believe our best work happens when we collaborate closely, learn from one another, and build together. We follow a hybrid work model that combines flexibility with a strong emphasis on in\\-person collaboration to foster innovation, culture, and rapid execution.
   

  

 Employees based near our Santa Clara, Bangalore, and Noida offices are expected to work from the office three days per week, as we believe regular in\\-person engagement is essential to how we build high\\-impact products and strong teams.
   

  

 Eightfold.ai provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, or disability.
   

  

 Experience our comprehensive benefits with family medical, vision and dental coverage, a competitive base salary, and eligibility for equity awards and discretionary bonuses or commissions.

title: ML/DL R & D Engineer @ Amritapuri Campus
description:
Job Title ML/DL R \\& D Engineer Location Kollam, Kerala Qualification M.Tech in Computer Science Engineering (or equivalent), MCA or related degree focused on AI. Job description
   

  

* Develop and implement adversarial attack techniques (e.g., FGSM, PGD, DeepFool) such as evasion, poisoning, model extraction, etc. to assess the robustness of AI models.
* Research and develop novel methodologies for adversarial robustness evaluation.
* Work closely with cybersecurity and AI researchers to identify vulnerabilities and propose mitigation strategies.
* Optimize model evaluation frameworks for adversarial testing, leveraging tools such as Foolbox, CleverHans, and Adversarial Robustness Toolbox (ART).
* Implement automated testing pipelines for continuous robustness assessment of ML models.
* Conduct experiments to analyze model vulnerabilities and generate detailed reports on findings.
* Ensure compliance with ethical standards and best practices in AI security research.


 Required Skills
   

  

* Strong background in machine learning, deep learning, and fundamentals of adversarial attack techniques.
* Proficiency in Python and deep learning frameworks such as TensorFlow and PyTorch.
* Knowledge of security principles in AI/ML applications.
* Familiarity with optimization techniques, gradient\\-based methods, and robust training strategies.
* Excellent problem\\-solving and research skills.
* Strong communication and collaboration skills.


 Job category Project Last date to apply January 30, 2026

title: Software Engineer, Senior
description:
Performs implementation of new functionality, programming, bug corrections, release testing, and beta support which may require research and analysis. Operates under general supervision. Does not typically have management responsibilities such as hiring, firing, performance appraisals, and pay reviews; however, may assist with such decisions and activities
   

  

 Responsibilities:
   

 \\* Performs moderately complex development, systems analysis and programming activities which may require some research and analysis:
   

 \\* Performs development, implementation and maintenance of single modules/sub\\-systems.
   

 \\* Prepares technical documentation of modules/sub\\-systems.
   

 \\* Conducts unit testing and integration testing for functionality and limits.
   

 \\* Assist with estimation and planning activities
   

 \\* Participate in reviewing deliverables from other development teams, including designs, test plans, and documentation help identify and resolve gaps between requirements and technical design
   

 \\* Performs moderately complex bug verification, release testing and beta support for assigned applications. Researches problems discovered by QA or application support and develop solutions to the problems.
   

 \\* May assist in performing on\\-site client work on moderately complex applications.
   

 \\* Researches and understands the marketing requirements for applications, including target environment, performance criteria and competitive issues.
   

 \\* Research new technology or development tools to remain informed of current technology.
   

  

 Qualifications:
   

 \\* Bachelor's degree or similar in software engineering or computer science.
   

 \\* Typically requires a minimum of 5 years of technical experience in programming and support.
   

 \\* Good technical knowledge in software development methodologies, design, programming and implementation.
   

 \\* Good analytical and design skills at multiple product level.
   

 \\* Good skills in research and analysis, project planning and implementation.
   

 \\* Good understanding of entire development process, including specification, documentation and quality assurance.
   

 \\* Aware of business issues as they impact overall project plans.
   

 \\* Good communications and interpersonal skills.
   

 \\* Advanced PC skills.
   

 \\* Helps to mentor less experienced employees in addition to fostering teamwork.
   

  

 About Infor

Join a global community of bold thinkers and innovators, where your expertise doesn’t just solve problems. it shapes industries, unlocks opportunities, and creates real\\-world impact for billions of people. At Infor, you’re not just building a career. you’re helping to build what’s next.
   

  

 Infor is a global leader in business cloud software products for companies in industry specific markets. Infor builds complete industry suites in the cloud and efficiently deploys technology that puts the user experience first, leverages data science, and integrates easily into existing systems. Over 60,000 organizations worldwide rely on Infor to help overcome market disruptions and achieve business\\-wide digital transformation.

 We have a relentless commitment to a culture based on PBM™. Informed by the principles that allow a free and open society to flourish, PBM™ prepares individuals to innovate, improve, and transform while fostering a healthy, growing organization that creates long\\-term value for its clients and supporters and fulfillment for its employees.
   

  

 Infor is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive work environment. Infor does not discriminate against candidates or employees because of their sex, race, gender identity, disability, age, sexual orientation, religion, national origin, veteran status, or any other protected status under the law. If you require accommodation or assistance at any time during the application or selection processes, please submit a request by following the directions located in the \\[2] FAQ section.

title: Engineer - Sys
description:
**Workbench Engineer**
**Wind River**
 In a world increasingly driven by software innovation, Wind River is pioneering the technologies to accelerate the digital transformation of our customers with a new generation of Mission Critical AI Systems in an AI\\-first world with the most exacting standards for safety, security, performance, and reliability. Success will be determined by our ability to innovate with velocity and sell at the solutions level.
   

  

 Wind River’s impact spans critical infrastructure domains such as telecommunications, including 5G; industrial (automation, sustainable energy, robotics, mining), connected healthcare and medical devices, automotive (connected and self\\-driving vehicles), and aerospace \\& defense. We were recognized by VDC Research in July 2020 as \\#1 in Edge Compute OS Platforms, overtaking Microsoft as the overall commercial leader. Wind River regularly wins industry recognitions for excellence in IoT security, cloud and edge computing, as well as 8 consecutive years as a “Top Work Place”. If you’re passionate about amplifying your impact on the world, in a caring, respectful culture with a growth mindset, come join us and help lead the way into the future of the intelligent edge!
   

  

**About The Opportunity**
 The team you will represent is pivotal to develop high quality software in Real Time Operating System.
   

  

 Your contribution in this role will impact the success of Wind River and customers.
   

  

 The focus of this role is to deliver a modern and convenient development platform to debug/analyze software and improve quality.
   

  

**Job Responsibilities :**
* Support on WorkBench (Eclipse \\-based IDE) including plug\\-ins and its installation.
* Work on Generating RPM(RedHat Pkg Mgr) from code
* Develop on Manufacturing into WB installable (WorkBench load/binary)
* Integrating WorkBench reference into Vxworks/HVP
* Design software in flexible, extendable architecture.
* Deliver high\\-quality and maintainable code and unit test.
* Debug and troubleshoot your code.
* Resolve problems reported from both internal and external customers.
* Improving teams’ effectiveness by helping other team members


**Your Background:**
* Bachelor or master’s degree in CS/EE or related areas.
* Java programming knowledge is a must with familiarity with Maven(Must be hands\\-on in both)
* Capable of working on Jenkins for CI and Docker tools.
* Good to have typescript/React experience.
* Working Knowledge on Eclipse IDE platform.
* Should have knowledge on creating plugin for Eclipse.
* Skills in complex software architecture/design.
* Good knowledge on Embedded System Design.
* Good Reading/Writing/Oral English communication skills.
* Very good teamwork spirit.
* Experienced in agile development environment.
* DevOps practices in software engineering.
* Grow mindset in technology and person.
* Teamwork spirit.


**BENEFITS :**
* Workplace Flexibility: Hybrid Work.
* Medical insurance: Group Medical Insurance coverage.
* Additional shared cost medical benefit in the form of reimbursements.
* Employee Assistance Program.
* Vacation and Time off: Employees are eligible for various types of paid time off.
* Additional Time off’s – Birthday, Volunteer Time off, Wedding.
* Wellness Benefits through Unmind
* Carrot (Family \\-forming support)


 Privacy Notice \\- Active Candidates: https://www.aptiv.com/privacy\\-notice\\-active\\-candidates
   

  

 Aptiv is an equal employment opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability status, protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by law.

title: RAS Lead
description:
**WHAT YOU DO AT AMD CHANGES EVERYTHING**
 At AMD, our mission is to build great products that accelerate next\\-generation computing experiences—from AI and data centers, to PCs, gaming and embedded systems. Grounded in a culture of innovation and collaboration, we believe real progress comes from bold ideas, human ingenuity and a shared passion to create something extraordinary. When you join AMD, you’ll discover the real differentiator is our culture. We push the limits of innovation to solve the world’s most important challenges—striving for execution excellence, while being direct, humble, collaborative, and inclusive of diverse perspectives. Join us as we shape the future of AI and beyond.
 **Together, we advance your career.**
**SMTS SILICON DESIGN ENGINEER**
**Roles \\& Responsibilities For RAS Lead**
* Define and develop the RAS charter for the Embedded BU as a center of excellence.
* Ensure robust planning at the pre\\-silicon stage, working with DV or Emulation teams and support the Leads and engineers in framing the relevant specification and test cases
* Closely work with the Architects and execute the RAS feature enablement and validation with rigour and timeliness
* Bigger picture planning for roadmaps and process improvements
* Create a cohesive culture of openness, diversity, technical growth for the team members
* Act with great resolve during testing times of critical issues, milestones, customer escalations and BU related internal changes
* Exhibit strong leadership qualities to take the team forward towards growth and achieving the mission of the company
* Exhibit great technical depth in the post silicon enablement and validation to take the right technical decisions for the team


**Individual Requirements**
* 13 years of Solid Experience and Knowledge in the HW and FW aspects of RAS feature implementation of x86 IPs like Cores, Memory, Inband and OOB RAS.
* Adept in calling out risks while anticipating issues and coming up with appropriate mitigation plans
* Great uplevelling skills to senior management
* Experienced in working with the Enablement Manager and Leads, Program Managers, Product Managers, BIOS/FW Managers and other cross functional stakeholders and create a robust alignment setup while running execution.
* Preferred experience working with cross\\-functional teams like DV/Silicon Designers/Pre\\-silicon/Platform/BIOS/FW/ SW.
* Experience in High Speed I/Os like PCIe (preferably Gen4 and above), Memory (DDR4/DDR5\\.LPDDR4/LPDDR5\\), USB4\\.0/3\\.2/3\\.1, USB PD, USB Type C, Display interfaces and Ethernet and high\\-speed interconnects.
* Experience in Power Management
* Hands\\-on high speed and board measurement techniques in using high end equipment like Oscilloscopes, Logic Analyzers, Debugger tools, Raspberry PI, Network analyzers, etc.
* Preferred experience with scripting using TCL, Python
* Excellent communication, collaboration, articulation, upleveling to senior management and team playing skills.


**Key Responsibilities**
* Ensuring the program asks for quality and time metrics and feature enablement are met without any glitches, with minimal senior management overseeing.
* Synergize with the Pre\\-silicon and DV teams and other stakeholders for proper interception of milestones and risk callouts.
* Actively participate in discussions with cross\\-functional teams in defining and refining test plans and guiding the team for the right path.
* Be on top of all issues pertinent to Debug \\& Triage of any functional issues specific across the entire validation cycle
* Drive meetings for issue closures and actively track schedules and milestone quality metrics
* Ensure the Best\\-in\\-class Documentation and collateral delivery from the team.
* Engage with the Post Silicon Enablement, Validation, BIOS/FW, Driver and QA Validation and CAE teams for seamless handing over of RAS Specifications, test plans or reports, as relevant.


*Benefits offered are described:* 
 AMD benefits at a glance.
   

  

*AMD does not accept unsolicited resumes from headhunters, recruitment agencies, or fee\\-based recruitment services. AMD and its subsidiaries are equal opportunity, inclusive employers and will consider all applicants without regard to age, ancestry, color, marital status, medical condition, mental or physical disability, national origin, race, religion, political and/or third\\-party affiliation, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, military or veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. We encourage applications from all qualified candidates and will accommodate applicants’ needs under the respective laws throughout all stages of the recruitment and selection process.*
*AMD may use Artificial Intelligence to help screen, assess or select applicants for this position. AMD’s “Responsible AI Policy” is available here.*
*This posting is for an existing vacancy.*

title: Azure Developer (NET Custom Web Dev & Logic Apps)
description:
Do you want to be part of an inclusive team that works to develop innovative therapies for patients? Every day, we are driven to develop and deliver innovative and effective new medicines to patients and physicians. If you want to be part of this exciting work, you belong at Astellas!
   

  

 Astellas Pharma Inc. is a pharmaceutical company conducting business in more than 70 countries around the world. We are committed to turning innovative science into medical solutions that bring value and hope to patients and their families. Keeping our focus on addressing unmet medical needs and conducting our business with ethics and integrity enables us to improve the health of people throughout the world. For more information on Astellas, please visit our website at www.astellas.com .
   

  

 This position is based in Bengaluru and will require some on\\-site work.
   

  

**Purpose And Scope**
 As a Microsoft .Net Engineer in Adobe.\\& Net Platforms, you will play a pivotal role in advancing our digital initiatives within our agile organization by designing and delivering innovative, enterprise\\-grade external facing web applications based on Microsoft .Net Framework and technologies. This role exists to architect, develop and maintain websites built on Microsoft .Net framework hosted on Azure cloud, enabling seamless content delivery and engagement of HCPs and Patients to Astellas owned web properties collaborating with cross\\-functional stakeholders both internal and external driving business value through technical expertise and stakeholder engagement aligned to enterprise capabilities. Our agile operating model—comprising Digital Capability for skill growth and Digital Execution for mission\\-aligned collaboration—uniquely positions you to balance cutting\\-edge Microsoft search solution delivery with the development of specialized expertise, while expertise in other enterprise search platforms is welcomed as an advantageous complement.
   

  

 In this role, you will architect, design, develop, deploy, and maintain custom web applications on leveraging your experience and a deep understanding of Microsoft .Net, Azure logic Apps, and related Microsoft .Net Framework and Azure cloud tools to meet organizational needs. You will work directly with stakeholders to translate requirements into scalable Microsoft custom .Net and Azure logic app solutions, multitask across projects, mentor team members, and stay ahead of technological advancements, making this position critical for transformative digital impact within Microsoft .Net framework.
   

  

 You will be at the forefront of implementing innovative solutions and will have the opportunity to work on cutting\\-edge technologies in your field.
   

  

**Essential Job Responsibilities**
* Architect, design, develop and deploy advanced enterprise web applications using Microsoft .Net Core and MVC, Microsoft SQL.
* Architect, design develop, deploy and maintain solutions on Azure Cloud (PaaS: including App Service, Azure functions, Logic Capps, Blob storage, Web apps )
* Conduct business analyses by engaging directly with stakeholders to understand custom web application related challenges.
* Design, develop websites to deliver customer experiences and engagement for brand teams.
* Develop web applications and Integrate with Web services sing Azure cloud and other enterprise Integration tools such as MuleSoft or other platforms.
* Develop integrations to handle data from websites residing on SQL server database.
* Provide expert\\-level technical support for Microsoft .Net Framework and Azure logic Applications and related tools, resolving issues with business users, delivery teams, external agencies, and vendors, applying Microsoft .Net platform knowledge.
* Performance Monitoring and Optimization: Regularly monitor web site performance using Lighthouse or similar tools.
* Security \\& Compliance: Ensure custom web solutions are secure and compliant with enterprise standards, including web governance and necessary documentation.
* Data Reporting: Work with reporting team (generating insights from Google Analytics or Adobe Analytics) to derive meaningful insights.
* Initiative Execution: Actively contribute to Microsoft .Net related initiatives, applying specialized skills to achieve the objectives and expected Value. Contribute to the ongoing realization of Value from these enterprise platforms through continuous integration and deployment.
* Collaboration and mentorship: Work collaboratively with team members within the subdivision and across other digital and business units. Mentor and guide team members with the same skills and technologies
* Continuous Learning: Engage in continuous learning and professional development to stay abreast of the latest trends and technologies in a specific area of expertise.
* Innovation: Contribute innovative ideas and approaches to enhance project outcomes and digital capabilities.
* Reporting: Regularly report on system use to your Capability Lead, VT captain, and team members.
* Problem\\-Solving: Employ analytical and problem\\-solving skills to overcome project challenges and deliver effective solutions.
* Quality Assurance: Ensure the highest quality and consistency in the work delivered.


**Qualifications Required**
* Bachelor's degree in relevant field, e.g., Computer Science, Data Science
* 10\\+ years of demonstrated engineering experience in designing and developing enterprise web solutions using C\\#, ASP.NET, and other related technologies, with a strong focus on Microsoft .Net Core, MVC and SQL Server.
* 3\\+ Years of experience in Azure PaaS(building App service, Web Apps, Azure functional, Logic Apps, Blob Storage, etc).
* Proven ability to perform business analyses, working directly with stakeholders to define and deliver search\\-focused technical solutions within the Microsoft ecosystem.
* Excellent understanding of object\\-oriented programming
* Proficiency in Microsoft .Net Framework for development and deployment including IIS Server, configuration, and management.
* Experience with CSR and SSL certificate renewal for websites
* Comprehensive working knowledge of related Microsoft and Integration technologies: Azure Functions, Azure Logic Apps, REST APIs, and integration with third party databases, platforms.
* Coding expertise in front end technologies such as JavaScript, HTML, CSS developing web applications.
* Strong understanding of relational databases, SQL, and data indexing within Microsoft platforms.
* Experience with Agile and DevOps methodologies, including Azure DevOps for CI/CD pipelines and version control in code deployments.
* Advanced problem\\-solving capabilities to troubleshoot and resolve issues across Microsoft applications, infrastructure, and deployment pipelines.
* Exceptional collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with development teams, business users, vendors, and external agencies.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to train and mentor others on Microsoft technologies.
* Adaptable to evolving project scopes and technologies, with a commitment to continuous learning in the Microsoft and Adobe domain.
* Ensure compliance with industry standards and best practices for security, scalability, and reliability.


**Preferred**
* Microsoft Certified: Microsoft .Net Developer, IIS administration, Azure Solutions Expert, Microsoft SQL.


**Working Environment**
* At Astellas we recognize the importance of work/life balance, and we are proud to offer a hybrid working solution allowing time to connect with colleagues at the office with the flexibility to also work from home. We believe this will optimize the most productive work environment for all employees to succeed and deliver. Hybrid work from certain locations may be permitted in accordance with Astellas’ Responsible Flexibility Guidelines.


 Category PlatformX
   

  

 Astellas is committed to equality of opportunity in all aspects of employment.
   

  

 EOE including Disability/Protected Veterans

title: Sr Engineer - Android
description:
**About Us:**
 As a Fortune 50 company with more than 400,000 team members worldwide, Target is an iconic brand and one of America's leading retailers. Target in India operates as a fully integrated part of Target’s global team and has more than 4,000 team members supporting the company’s global strategy and operations.
   

  

**Tech Overview**
 Every time a guest enters a Target store or browses Target.com, they experience the impact of Target’s investments in technology and innovation. We’re the technologists behind one of the most loved retail brands, delivering joy to millions of our guests, team members, and communities.
   

  

 Join our global in\\-house technology team of more than 4,000 of engineers, data scientists, architects, coaches and product managers striving to make Target the most convenient, safe and joyful place to shop. We use agile practices and leverage open\\-source software to adapt and build best\\-in\\-class technology for our team members and guests—and we do so with a focus on diversity and inclusion, experimentation and continuous learning.
   

  

**Pyramid Overview**
 Target.com and Mobile translates the in\\-store experience our guests love to the digital environment. Our Mobile Engineers develop native apps like Cartwheel and Target’s flagship app, which are high\\-impact and high\\-visibility assets that are game\\-changers for literally millions of guests. Here, you’ll get to explore emerging retail and mobile technologies, playing a key role in revolutionary product launches with tech giants like Apple and Google. You’ll be a visionary for the future of Target’s app ecosystem. You’ll have the advantage of Target’s unmatched brand recognition and special marketplace foothold—making us the partner of choice for innovative technologies like indoor mapping, iBeacons and Apple Pay. You’ll help Target evolve by using the latest open source tools and technologies and staying true to strong agile practices. You’ll lend your passion for engineering technologies that fix problems and meet needs guests didn’t even know they had. You’ll work on autonomous teams and incorporate the newest technical practices. You’ll have the chance to perform by writing rock\\-solid code that stands up to our massive scale. Plus, and perhaps best of all, you’ll have the right balance of self\\-rule and accountability for how technical products perform.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
 As a Senior Android Engineer on the Flagship mobile team, you will:
   

  

* Develop clean, well\\-tested native Android code to deliver functionality that meets business objectives.
* Improve code structure and architecture in service of testability, observability, and maintainability.
* Work closely with partner teams \\- QA, UX, A11Y, Product \\- as needed
* Perform complex engineering tasks independently as well as collaboratively.
* Manage complex cross\\-team coordination and dependencies.
* Evaluate and communicate different engineering solutions and trade\\-offs.


 Core responsibilities of this job are described within this job description. Job duties may change at any time due to business needs.
   

  

**What You Will Need**
* 5\\+ years of experience in software design \\& development with 3\\+ years of experience in developing apps for android.
* Experience developing in Kotlin.
* Demonstrates broad and deep expertise in Java/Kotlin and frameworks. Designs, develops, and approves end\\-to\\-end functionality of a product line, platform, or infrastructure.
* Communicates and coordinates with project team, partners, and stakeholders.
* Demonstrates expertise in analysis and optimization of systems capacity, performance, and operational health.
* Maintains deep technical knowledge within areas of expertise.
* Stays current with new and evolving technologies via formal training and self\\-directed education.
* Experience integrating with third party frameworks tools and SDKs, such as Retrofit, OKHttp, Moshi and Glide.
* Excellent hands\\-on skills with Android application development tools, including Android Studio, Android SDK and ADT.


**Know More About Us Here**
**Life at Target\\-** 
**https://india.target.com/**
**Benefits\\-** 
**https://india.target.com/life\\-at\\-target/workplace/benefit**
**Culture\\-** 
**https://india.target.com/life\\-at\\-target/belonging**

title: Unified Collaboration Engineer
description:
Global Technology Solutions (GTS) at ResMed is a division dedicated to creating innovative, scalable, and secure platforms and services for patients, providers, and people across ResMed. The primary goal of GTS is to accelerate well\\-being and growth by transforming the core, enabling patient, people, and partner outcomes, and building future\\-ready operations.
   

  

 The strategy of GTS focuses on aligning goals and promoting collaboration across all organizational areas. This includes fostering shared ownership, developing flexible platforms that can easily scale to meet global demands, and implementing global standards for key processes to ensure efficiency and consistency.
   

  

**About The Team**
 Unified Collaboration Service team is responsible for designing, implementing, and supporting the collaboration and communication platforms that connect Resmed's global workforce. We manage the technologies that enable seamless communication, from Microsoft Teams and Exchange to telephony systems and compliance tools. We focus on delivering reliable, integrated communication experiences while ensuring data governance and regulatory compliance. By partnering with business units, security, and infrastructure teams, we enable effective collaboration across time zones and empower teams to work efficiently in hybrid environments.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a
 **Unified** 
**Collaboration Engineer** 
 , you'll independently manage and optimize Resmed's collaboration ecosystem—Microsoft Teams, Exchange Online / Hybrid , Teams Telephony, Microsoft Purview. You'll resolve complex technical issues, lead implementation projects, and contribute to strategic improvements of our communication and employee experience platforms. This specialist role requires you to apply company policies and best practices to solve moderate to complex problems with minimal supervision. You'll collaborate across teams, contribute to technical analysis and reporting, and help shape the evolution of our unified communications and digital workplace strategy.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
**Advanced Platform Administration**
* Independently manage Microsoft Teams environments including governance, policies, and advanced configurations
* Design and implement Exchange Online solutions for complex mail routing and compliance requirements with Hybrid architecture
* Configure and optimize Teams Telephony including auto attendants, call queues, and voice routing policies
* Maintain Microsoft Purview compliance solutions including retention policies
* Understanding on Cisco Telephony system and ready to be sunset (retired)


**Compliance \\& Governance Management**
* Support data retention policies implementation across communication platforms
* Manage eDiscovery processes and support legal/compliance requests
* Configure and maintain information protection policies
* Conduct compliance audits and generate regulatory reports


**Complex Problem Resolution**
* Resolve escalated issues across UC and Exchange platforms requiring in\\-depth analysis
* Perform root cause analysis for recurring problems and implement permanent fixes
* Coordinate with Microsoft support for premier\\-level issues
* Lead incident response for UC\\-related outages and service degradations


**Stakeholder Collaboration**
* Partner with business units to understand communication requirements
* Present technical solutions to non\\-technical stakeholders
* Collaborate with security team on UC security posture
* Work with network team to ensure voice quality and reliability


**Qualifications**
**Required**
* Bachelor’s degree in IT, Computer Science, or equivalent experience
* 5\\+ years of experience in Microsoft 365 administration or Unified Communications
* Strong expertise in Microsoft Teams, Exchange Online, and SharePoint Online
* Solid understanding of Hybrid Active Directory and Exchange environments
* Proficiency in PowerShell scripting and automation
* Strong analytical, problem\\-solving, and communication skills


**Preferred**
* Experience with Microsoft Teams Phone System and Direct Routing
* Knowledge of Microsoft Purview Compliance Center (SC\\-400 / SC\\-401\\)
* Experience with Hybrid Exchange architectures
* Microsoft 365 certifications (MS\\-700, MS\\-203\\)
* Familiarity with JIRA and Agile methodologies
* Experience in regulated industries or healthcare


**Technical \\& Functional Competencies**
* Advanced Microsoft 365 administration and troubleshooting
* PowerShell automation and scripting
* Voice and telephony systems (Teams, Cisco, NICE inContact)
* Compliance, data governance, and eDiscovery
* Project execution, technical documentation, and solution design


**Core Behavioral Competencies**
* Domain Expertise: Resolves complex UC and digital workplace issues; applies governance and best practices
* Influence \\& Communication: Collaborates effectively across IT and business teams; drives adoption through training and engagement
* Critical Thinking: Balances productivity, privacy, and compliance; delivers data\\-driven, business\\-aligned solutions


 Joining us is more than saying “yes” to making the world a healthier place. It’s discovering a career that’s challenging, supportive and inspiring. Where a culture driven by excellence helps you not only meet your goals, but also create new ones. We focus on creating a diverse and inclusive culture, encouraging individual expression in the workplace and thrive on the innovative ideas this generates. If this sounds like the workplace for you, apply now! We commit to respond to every applicant.

title: Senior Application Specialist OTC
description:
IMEA (India, Middle East, Africa)
   

  

 India
   

  

 LIXIL INDIA PVT LTD
   

  

 Employee Assignment
   

  

 Fully remote possible
   

  

 Full Time
   

  

 7 December 2025
   

  

**Position Title** 
 : Senior Application Specialist OTC
 **Department** 
 : IT/Digital – OTC
   

  

**Career Path Level:** 
 Senior Reports to: Workstream Leader
   

  

**Position Purpose**
 The Senior Application specialist plays a key role in ensuring the stability, quality, and strategic evolution of IT systems and processes. With significant experience and deep domain knowledge, the Senior Application specialist takes ownership of complex technical or functional areas, mentors less experienced colleagues, and drives solution design and continuous improvement initiatives. This role serves as a bridge between operational execution and architectural thinking, providing leadership within projects and a trusted point of contact for business or technical counterparts.
   

  

**Position Summary:** 
 As a Senior Application specialist, you are a recognized expert in your IT domain. You independently manage and deliver complex initiatives, resolve critical issues, and ensure that solutions align with business needs and IT standards. Your work is both hands\\-on and strategic: balancing delivery with system improvement, business engagement, and peer development. Collaboration across functions, regions, and stakeholder groups is essential to your role.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Take proactive ownership of complex system areas, developments, or processes with minimal supervision within your area of expertise, cross functionally and together with internal and external stakeholders.
* Serve as subject matter expert in your domain; provide advanced support and solution guidance
* Design, implement, and optimize processes or system changes aligned with strategic goals and based on business objectives, user needs, and regulatory requirements.
* Mentor and support junior and mid\\-level colleagues through structured guidance and coaching.
* Actively contribute to project planning, scoping, and design activities; represent IT in business\\-facing discussions.
* Ensure adherence to industry and system standards, documentation, and compliance requirements.


**General Requirements**
* Master’s degree in System Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field
* Minimum of eight years hands\\-on experience in your field of expertise.
* Proven ability to lead complex initiatives independently, such as large scale projects and drive results.
* Demonstrated leadership in process improvement, problem\\-solving, or technical advancement.
* Strong communication skills in English, both verbal and written; able to clearly convey technical concepts to non\\-technical stakeholders.
* Ability to collaborate effectively in cross\\-functional and international teams.
* Can support and mentor others and contribute to team development and knowledge sharing. Growth Expectations:


 Senior Application specialists are expected to demonstrate influence beyond their immediate team, consistently deliver high\\-quality outcomes, and take initiative in strategic or cross\\-team programs. Growth from Senior to Solution Architect is marked by a shift from deep expertise to broader architectural vision, proactive business engagement, and a leadership role in shaping future IT solutions.
